title: runtime: allow calling Go library from C/C++ program
body:
I just wrote [a blog post](https://medium.com/using-go-in-mobile-apps/using-go-in-mobile-apps-part-1-calling-go-functions-from-c-be1ecf7dfbc6) about my process of trying to add Go code to a C program. I was very surprised to find that Go needs to generate main() on its own, and that Go cannot be initialized from C code.

I'm developing a mobile app, and changing main() is not ideal for me on both iOS and Android.
